grails.plugin.cache.ehcache

Class GrailsEhcacheCacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • grails.plugin.cache.ehcache.GrailsEhcacheCacheManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    grails.plugin.cache.GrailsCacheManager, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.cache.CacheManager

    public class GrailsEhcacheCacheManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements grails.plugin.cache.GrailsCacheManager, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Based on org.springframework.cache.ehcache.EhCacheCacheManager; reworked to return GrailsEhcacheCache instances.
